channel.title: Fucking bullshit

item.title: Fucking bullshit
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

[quote=“Mod Franklin, post:14, topic:281318”][quote author=lildude783 link=topic=371492.msg2806693#msg2806693 date=1243777936]

[quote=“lildude783”]dude… this is pretty easy? every source has an item.cfg … just go in there do CTRL+F and search for Granite … search it until u find granite_maul … and then go over to where it has like a bunch of numbers to the left of it… the 2ND to last number… is the STR bonus… if u make that at 99999999 ur guy will hit 100 as a n3wb…

[/quote][quote=“dalcian”]If you read the code properly you’d see that it’s the spec not hitting, not the maul it’s self.[/quote]

… no? its the real thing dude… not the special… u try it dalcian … its NOT a special atttack … if u go into item.cfg find granite_maul or granitemaul or granite maul… or whatever it says! then go change the 2nd to last number on the right to 70 for a decent bonus and 9999999 for an impossible to not 1 hit k0 u bonus
[/quote]

Dude he dosent want to edit the max hit hes having problem with hitting he keeps hitting 0’s and he has change the max hit and str bonus[/quote]

… sigh if u go into ur items.cfg (like i said be4?) and changed the 3rd number to higher… it’ll raise the attack bonuses…

HIGHER ATT BONUSES = NOT MUCH HITTIN 0s?

right?

Read full topic

item.title: Fucking bullshit
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Is there a specific method that serves the same function as ‘getHit’, but for NPC’s?

For example: ‘c.specialAttack’ is changed to ‘c.specialAttackNPC’ when you use a special attack against an NPC.

Read full topic

item.title: Fucking bullshit
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

dude... this is pretty easy? every source has an item.cfg ... just go in there do CTRL+F and search for Granite ... search it until u find granite_maul .... and then go over to where it has like a bunch of numbers to the left of it... the 2ND to last number... is the STR bonus... if u make that at 99999999 ur guy will hit 100 as a n3wb...
If you read the code properly you'd see that it's the spec not hitting, not the maul it's self.

… no? its the real thing dude… not the special… u try it dalcian … its NOT a special atttack … if u go into item.cfg find granite_maul or granitemaul or granite maul… or whatever it says! then go change the 2nd to last number on the right to 70 for a decent bonus and 9999999 for an impossible to not 1 hit k0 u bonus

item.title: Fucking bullshit
item.dc:creator: @Dalcian Dalcian
item.description:
@Dalcian wrote:

Well, I noticed my granite maul was hitting 0’s, So I made the gethit higher, Still nothing so I made it 999999 to see if it would hit. Still 0’s.

if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4153 && c.specialAmount > 49 && c.IsAttackingNPC){ c.specialAtkNPC(true, 50, 340, 1667); c.getHit(9999999); }

All I can say is.

Fuck you granite maul.

Any ideas? -.-

Read full topic
